fields.name: source
fields.description: A name used to identify the data source, must be unique to differentiate among all data sources. The name should match the folder name.

fields.name: type
fields.description: The type of data source, e.g. an article, website, report, misc.

fields.name: title
fields.description: The title of the data source or reference.

fields.name: author
fields.description: The author(s) or authoring institution of the data source.
fields.example: John Doe, Jane Smith, International Example Agency

fields.name: url
fields.description: The website or URL where the data source can be accessed.

fields.name: doi
fields.description: The DOI (Digital Object Identifier) of the data source.
